issue.title: [R][CI] Unbreak builds following R 4.0 release
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8607](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8607). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Just a tourniquet to get master passing again while I work on ARROW-8604.
